703618f-b.text:
Classon Avenue, north from Fulton Street. At Putnam Avenue is the Church of the Nativity of Our Blessed Lord. At Mnroe Street (left background) is the Classon Avenue Presbyterian Church. View 2 is north irom ~Sadison, showing the Classon Avenue Church.
P. L. Sperr  September 14, 1941
NO RPPRODUCTIONS  View 1-3
wRcww 22 reg N2.~ee17
-e.w. S NVeg.No ~-1a2o
703618f-b.folder: Classon Avenue & Fulton Street, Brooklyn, NY
